entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • new List<T>(IEnumrable<T>) & List<T>.AddRange(IEnumerable<T>) doesn't use IIListProvider. #98835
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Warn on use of StreamReader.EndOfStream in async methods #98834
  • [API Proposal]: : AVX-IFMA Intrinsics #98833
  • [MT][browser] MutexTests.AbandonExisting #98830
    9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations #98828
    9.0.0
  • Address high-severity vulnerability CVE-2023-29331 in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 6.0.1 and 7.0.1 #98827
  • PublishAot fails with CodeGenerationFailedException/InvalidOperationException at TypeSystemHelpers.ContainsSignatureVariables #98821
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `AVX512 FP16` and `AVX` `F16C` ISA #98820
  • mono: Implement support for generic unmanaged calli #98819
    9.0.0
  • Strange behavior of the application regarding it's locale #98818
  • profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd failing on windows arm64 #98817
  • Question about exception handling #98815
  • BitArray.CopyTo(Array, int) throws an ArgumentException, if BitArray.Length has been reduced to a multiple of 32 #98813
    Future
  • XDocument parses strings with ASCII HTML number to ASCII Symbol #98810
  • ReadOnly Attribute on Directory results in AccessDenied-Exception #98807
  • [mono] expression Cannot box IsByRefLike type 'System.ReadOnlySpan`1' #98805
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] PlatformNotSupportedException Blocking wait is not supported on the JS interop threads #98804
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Add metrics to the asmdiffs report #98800
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Also display perfscore improvements/regressions separately #98799
    9.0.0
  • Failed to setup SSL connection with .NET8 Linux-Container Image with failure "Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream" #98797
  • Access to the path '' is denied #98796
  • PersianCalendarTests.IsLeapYear failing #98795
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for UInt128 type to IPAddress class. #98792
    Future
  • Slower IDispatch calls in compare to .NET Framework. #98788
  • Test failure: profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd #98787
  • [8.0] Stream aborted by peer (268) in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #98786
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Unmanaged calli not supported with generic arguments #9136
    9.0.0
  • Diff in checked vs. release #98772
    9.0.0
  • Dependency Name does not contain 'Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.' error in source build leg #98822
  • Unable to profile Mac Catalyst apps with `dotnet trace` #96970
  • DesignerAttribute/EditorAttribute size implications #92043
    Future
  • [mono] mono_thread_detach hit assert #98751
  • dotnet CLI commands no longer work in .NET 7/8 with detached console #98441
  • System.Runtime.Caching MemoryCache.CacheMemoryLimit on macos number seems not correct. #98793

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not crash on a never true `typeof(T) == typeof(Gen<>)` #98836
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add encodings FL_3A to FX_3A #98832
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
  • [release/8.0-staging] Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98825
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98824
  • Add missing "internal use" for register created for LoadAndInsertScalar() #98814
  • Replace unaligned casts in Buffer.Memmove #98812
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md #98801
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator for IgnoreCase multi-strings #98791
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Interface maps' TargetMethods array should only contain generic method definitions, not instances #98790
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • Detect CPUs with throttled 512-bit width instructions #98806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BI_2A` to `SVE_HF_2A` #98784
    arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Invalidate m_switchDescMap instead of updating it #98789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add back optimization of Encode using arm64 load/store/vectortablelookup #98719
    needs-area-label
  • Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98731
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix issue runing RLCSE in release #98785
  • Fix VS debugger tests issues #98783
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove bash dep from init scripts #98781
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Log ManagedThreadId and NativeThreadId for known test failures #98291
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy thread #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • SPMI: Handle PerfScore=0 edge case #98775
  • Add correct ImplementingType and InterfaceImpl to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0] Bump NuGet.ProjectModel version #98724
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #98456
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98455
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #98454
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add info in docs about diagnosing Build Analysis failures #98778
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Add backtracking stack imbalance detection to regex source generator #98472
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Cache the InterfaceImplementation for the concrete type that requires the DIM to be kept in DefaultInterfaceImplementations cache #98782
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Intrinsify ClearWithoutReferences and Fill #98700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add analyzer support for feature guards #94944
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: test the new cse policy in jit-experimental #98777
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add "driver" support to Mono AOT cross compiler. #97226
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • datas tuning fix #98743
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assertion error for DynamicHelpers::CreateDictionaryLookupHelper(). #98741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors of the struct argument parsing in LoongArch64PassStructInRegister.cs #98744
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Review UX and bindings for .NET Swift interop tooling in simple P/Invoke void cases #2518

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial precise LSSA implementation #2510
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Implement projection tooling for simple P/Invoke cases #2517
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Add initial documentation for the projection tooling #2512
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • packages.lock.json is changed when publishing #38954
  • dotnet workload update seems to do a lot of stuff #38953
  • Razor references version '4.10.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.9.0.0' #38942
  • Can`s pair to mac from windows #38941
  • ReadyToRun solution-level caching of R2R assemblies #38937

Closed

  • `dotnet list package` command options should support shorter names. For example, -f for --framework. Have to specify the long name every time. #37385
    8.0.3xx
  • Translation Error #38867

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport #38882 to release/8.0.3xx #38960
  • Remove getX MSBuild flags from restore invocation #38956
  • Use merged Razor compiler DLL #38943
  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938

Merged

  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #38882
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport to fix MSBuild Version #38955
  • [dotnet list package] add an alias option, `-s`, to the option `--source`. #38911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update LocalizableStrings.zh-Hans.xlf #38918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #7651
  • String-based enums #2849
  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913
  • Declaration of ref/out parameters in lambdas without typename #338
    Any Time

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected coalesce operation is applied to `char.ToString()` involved into concatenation with a null or empty constant string #72232
  • Clone of Test_IndexerWithNoRequiredParameters for params collections fails #72227
  • Clone of UnwrapParamsArray fpr params collections #72225
  • Explicit interface member completion doesn't work with params collections #72224
  • Add `ArgumentKind.ParamCollection` #72222
  • Inlay Hint type should take into account using alias #72219

Closed

  • `IDE0240` codefix leaves redundunt blank line #63163
    Backlog
  • Auto-quotes and "$" operator problem #62571
    17.6 P3
  • Enumerable.Empty and IDE0301 #72231
  • Nuget for Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.9.0 #72117

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename BoundNode flag for clarity #72235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • [WIP] Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • WIP: Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
  • Move all the MSBuildWorkspace projects under a single folder #72226
  • WIP: Defer create CompilationTracker._buildLock #72223
  • WIP: Version 2: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72220

Merged

  • Fix string completion within global statements #72234
  • Add `ArgumentKind.ParamCollection` #72221
  • Simplify how frozen partial documents are produced. #72106
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove at most 1 end of line preceding redundant nullable directives #72150
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improvements to classification perf with large string literals. #72217
  • Address cases where brace matching wasn't working for string quotes. #72233
  • Support UnscopedRef attribute on interface methods and properties #72171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add missing IClientRequestManager implementation to EA.Xaml #72187
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Clone some IDE tests for params collections #72228
    Area-IDE, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Enable OSX queues #72218
  • Re-enable GetAsyncEnumerator optional parameter asserts #72204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged

Updated

  • Keep as much parsed state as we can when producing frozen compilations #72184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do all parsing work using InProgressState translation actions in the compilation tracker #72215
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • WIP: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72213
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState #72211
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add pipeline that tests the latest IdentityModel nightlies #54180
    .NET 9 Planning
  • RequestTimeoutsMiddleware doesn't seem to work outside of me manually throwing an OperationCancelledException #54179
  • JSON Patch PocoAdapter does not utilize the contract resolver when converting values. #54178
  • Puppeteer failing to download Chrome #54176
    9.0-preview3
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2: Windows Authentication (IIS, NTLM) not working when TokenImpersonationLevel is "Identification" #54175
  • InvalidToken when confirming email change #54173
  • Request delegate generator produces CS8073 for ValueTask<T?> results #54172
  • TP Worker threads dead-lock in `Http2OutputProducer.Stop()` method #54174
  • Blazor WASM: MSAL authentication stuck on login callback #54171
  • Mix static routing with webassemble (auto, etc) modes #54170
  • TLS 1.3 negotiation fails with FIPS-enabled Ubuntu 22.04 server and Chromium based browsers #54169
  • AddMiddlewareAnalysis does not detect custom middleware #54166

Closed

  • Integration Challenge: ASP.NET Core Identity Crashes with reCAPTCHA in Blazor Web App (rendermode InteractiveServer) #52809
  • Blazer Server Authentication Issues #53275
  • Scaffold + Google authentication does not sign out the google account on Logout #53175
  • EditForm in foreach loop not working without rendermode InteractiveServer #54108
  • Suggest providing a visual interface layout tool,like the asp.net webform. #54165
  • Incorrect usage of `ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf` in #54143
  • WPF - Blazor hybrid - staticwebassets.runtime.json content root path problem #52771
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Merged

  • Skip puppeteer tests for now #54177
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Incorrect usage of the `ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf` #54144
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Manually resolve ref and runtime packs instead of modifying the .NET SDK used in the build #54147
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Delete markdownlint workflow #54042
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update CODEOWNERS #54043
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • fixed DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577 #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #54119
    area-auth, community-contribution, area-security

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected error in .NET Core 3.1 when running "Collect metrics" sample from MS documentation #4522
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinUI] Add tests for loading fonts when unpackaged #20791
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Maui .net8.0 Android Picker TextColor not updating #20788
  • Cannot create an IOS archive 'TestApp'. Process cannot be executed on XMA server. The "Copy" task failed unexpectedly. #20786
  • [iOS] Gif Loading code broke the ability on iOS to load images without specifying an extention #20782
    .NET 8 SR3
  • FlyoutIsPresented is not working on Android #20779
  • [BUG] [iOS] CarouselView Alignment problem #20778
    Backlog
  • ContentTemplate pages are not executing functions. #20777
  • Flickering occurs while updating the width of ContentView through PanGestureRecognizer. #20772
    Backlog
  • Shadows Don't Render Correctly Inside Collection View Item Tempate. #20771
    Backlog
  • La propriété "Color" de la balise "MauiSplashScreen" remplit parfois partiellement l'arrière plan #20766
    Backlog
  • CollectionView SelectableItemsViewAdapter System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess Arg_ParamName_Name, index #20764
  • Navigation menu switching is very slow in Windows #20762

Closed

  • TabBar navigation menu is not displayed on the Windows platform icon, Android is normal #20773
  • [XamlC] The compiled binding IL is invalid when the path points to a static property #20768
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Users require .NET 8 to be downloaded separately to run WinUI app #19763
  • Activity class {com.companyname.polnk/companyname.mymauiapp.activity} does not exist. #20626
  • GeoLocation.GetLocationAsync() failing on sequential calls after initially getting the location. #20620
    Backlog
  • Android - CollectionView DataTemplate with ContentView Content binding causes error when scrolling #20560
  • vs code run auto suggestion #20573
  • Mac Mini - Monterey (12.7.3) #20780
  • FilePicker on MacOs (MacCatalyst) returns null #20741
  • App Icon doesn't appear in window title bar #20265
  • WinUI - Circle view not rotating from center #17694
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #5531
  • No content inside PDF which is loaded in Customwebview in MAUI application on Android #20603
  • Splash Screen does not update iOS #20604
  • Navigation menu switching is very slow in Winodws #20761
  • The navigation menu does not display the current cursor position correctly #20539
  • Maui iOS WebView - MauiWKWebView DidFinishNavigation not called. #20713
    Backlog
  • TemplatedCell.UpdateSelectionColor() Object reference not set to an instance of an object error #20607
  • DynamicResource not working for inner views #3745
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fallback if user doesn't specify ext on image #20796
  • iOS Shell TitleView Update Height #20795
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, migration-compatibility, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix crash if users only sets selected color on android bottom tabs #20793
  • Add the trailing .0 to all the windows things #20792
  • Support the unpackaged format for font loading #20790
  • [XamlC] Fix error XDataTypeSyntax message format #20787
  • [ci] Upload build asset data to darc/maestro #20785
  • Android Google Maps bump #20783
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Protect NRE in TemplatedCell #20770
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨

Merged

  • [XamlC] Fix typed binding static property #20769
  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Fix usage of feature switches in Debug mode #20748
  • [Trimming] Disable query property assignment via reflection on NativeAOT #20731

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Batch execution of multiple ExecuteUpdate / ExecuteDelete / ExecuteSql #33143
  • Why create table twice? #33141
  • Sqlite foreign key constraint violation exception does not include constraint name #33140
  • Data type Decimal(n,0) causes an exception in SQL server by create and update #33139
  • Add the attribute ExcludeFromCodeCoverage for migrations #33138
  • Long Compilation Time and Large Designer Files in EF Core 7 Project #33137
  • Add tests for EFCore.Tasks #33136

Closed

  • `Select` projection with an (uncorrelated) subquery produces two separate SQL queries #33012
    9.0.0
  • Optimize ParameterExtractingExpressionVisitor #32698
    9.0.0
  • Make ParameterExtractingExpressionVisitor capable of extracting paths to evaluatable fragments in the tree #32999
    9.0.0
  • Error: Script-Migration -Idempotent -Context "MyDbContext" -StartupProject "MyStartupProject" -Project "MyDataProject" #33113
  • Why is Package Manager trying to suggest incompatible updates? #33135

PullRequests

Merged

  • Rewrite the funcletizer to support precompiled queries #33106

Updated

  • Add OptimizeContext MSBuild target that runs on build #33049

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Test SBRP package removal #18755
  • Update sync script reference in VMR readme #18754
  • Remove separate package-source-build project #18750
  • Add SdkArchiveDiff task to verify the sdk archive has all the expected files #18748

Merged

  • Arcade patch to ignore std error warning format #18751
  • Isolate package flow between repos #18557
  • Don't append to but overwrite the log file #18746
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18744
  • Remove aspire exclusion #18663

Updated

  • Binary tooling #18726
  • Add VMR support for Windows-x64 PGO Instrumented leg #18672
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Store repo build exit code #18708
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18740
    Branch Lockdown
